From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>


 "Can he be trusted," Panzertron asked Allitron.

 "He's Megatron, not in the slightest but then again
he is also the first one to seriously contact us since
our arrival." Allitron said, "What of the damage to
our ship and who was doing it?"

 "Who ever he was he was leaving when i got there.
Damage is slight but the armor more then held. It was
ment for capital ship weapons so hand held did nothing
of real measure."

  Allitron nodded," I checked the logs, apparently he
has been buzzing the ship while we were talking to
megatron. Why he waved at the secondary command bridge
i don't know, might have mistaken it for this one. He
then tried attacking one of the main battery turrets
and got no where."

  "How was he here for so long and went un reported?'
Panzertron asked.

  "Just see that it don't happen again. Also, bring
the ship to condition red, Zardus is showing up soon
and i don't want any more unexpected visitors once he
gets here. This includes internal and outboard
sensors, let see if the system works as good as the
desginers claimed it would."

 "Yes General."
